MY_HEALTH.TITLE: My Health
MY_HEALTH.QUESTION1: 1. Have you ever had, been told to have or suspected to have:
QUESTION1_DETAILS: Chest pain, heart attack, or coronary artery disease, or any kind of stroke
Cancer, or growth of any kind
Acute or chronic liver disease, or viral hepatitis
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, or acute or chronic lung diseases
Physical defect or deformities, or ear or eye condition
Congenital or hereditary disease, or mental health problem
Any disease or disorder of major organs
Any severe disease not mentioned above
In the past 6 months, unexplained bleeding or weight loss
QUESTION2_DETAILS: Been hospitalized for 3 or more consecutive days
Under regular medication for at least 2 weeks
Had any surgery or medical tests with abnormal results
QUESTION3_DETAILS: Requested any other life insurance, critical illness, medical insurance or disability insurance proposal/policy that was declined or modified

BRIGHTLIFE.TITLE: Brightlife
BRIGHTLIFE.DESCRIPTION: Live worry-free no matter what happens as you have a full year of financial protection. Brightlife is a digital life insurance plan which provides financial protection for your family upon the risk of Death or Total Permanent Disability (TPD). This plan provides financial protection up to USD 10,000.
